roleset.name: tell, alert
roleset.note: NOTIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'notify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'tell'. (from notify.01-v predicate notes)
NOTIFICATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, notify.01. Corresponds to VNcls advise-37.9, tell-37.2. (from notification.01-n)

example.name: active, sentential utterance
example.text: BellSouth has notified LIN that it would ``shortly respond to the McCaw proposal in as full and effective a manner as is warranted.''
example.arg: it would ``shortly respond to the McCaw proposal in as full and effective a manner as is warranted

example.name: passive, PP utterance
example.text: UAL wouldn't elaborate on a statement that it-1 had been notified *trace*-1 of the filing by Reliance.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: He has decided to receive his notification of the nomination at Oyster Bay, which probably will be made to him early in July.

example.name: args 2 as complement clause
example.text: Fred Goldman complained of the time lapse in his notification that his son was killed the previous evening.
example.arg: that his son was killed the previous evening

example.name: just arg1
example.text: If you have evidence that he assaults his own kids , I 'd be considering a chold protection notification .
